document.full_text: former illinois governor rod blagojevich took the stand on friday for the second day in his federal corruption trial, denying he tried to shake down a race track owner in exchange for signing legislation favorable to the industry.
document.title: blagojevich denies shaking down race track owner
lines_and_colors: former illinois governor rod blagojevich took the stand on friday for the second day in his federal corruption trial, denying he tried to shake down a race track owner in exchange for signing legislation favorable to the industry.
